name: DivX Temporary Video Info File
summary: Learn about .DINFO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: DINFO files are used with DDAT files and .DMSK files to download video in DivX Player. DDAT, DMSK, and DINFO files use the same file name prefix and are can be found in the "Temporary Downloaded Files" folder within the DivX Player installation.

description: File used by DivX Player, a program used to play videos; contains metadata for the location of its corresponding .DDAT video file as well as the download link; used to save and load information for download, streaming, and playback of video.
